attributes.action: pay a pension to all who served in forces pre 1975
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: it is very unjust for the govement not to pay a pension to all who served in the armed force pre 1975.. who did not do 22years or more  / people are getting pensions now if they only do small amounts of time..and this is very unjust
